name: 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline
description: The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline is a national network of local crisis centers providing free, confidential emotional support 24/7 to people in suicidal crisis or emotional distress.
fullDescription: The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline is a national network of local crisis centers providing free, confidential emotional support 24/7 to people in suicidal crisis or emotional distress.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 phone, text, and chat support
- Trained crisis counselors available in English and Spanish
- Specialized support for veterans (press 1)
- LGBTQ+ specific support available
- Deaf/hard of hearing support via TTY
howToGetIt: Call or text 988 from any phone, anytime. You can also chat online at 988lifeline.org. No appointment or insurance needed.
